entry.tran: 紧密相连的;密切合作的；志同道合的
entry.def: A close-knit group of people are closely linked, do things together, and take an interest in each other.

example.ex: Events over the last year have created a close-knit community.
example.tran: 去年发生的一些事让整个社会紧密团结在一起。

means.word_mean: 1. held together as by social or cultural ties;
